help: Resets all the relations to the five Vass families.
Resets practically all data that can be reset in the Vass mod. Might be not be 100 percent stable, use at your own risk.
'Meets' the Perturba contact person. Mainly for getting yourself out of a bugged situation.
Maxes out your relations to Perturba and the Vass 'umbrella faction'. Mainly for speeding up debugging, may have some unintended consequences.
